title: CLDF dataset accompanying List's "Inference of Partial Colexifications" from 2023 building on Key and Comrie's "Intercontinental Dictionary Series" from 2021
description:
Cite the source of the dataset as:

List, J.-M. (2023): Inference of partial colexifications from multilingual wordlists. Frontiers in Psychology 14.1156540. 1-10.
